name: Kitchen Knight (Team 12)
description:
You and your friend are working in a restaurant. You must work to cook and serve food to customers simultaneously. In this Arcade style game, try to serve as many customers as you can and get the high score!

CONTROLS

Mouse - drag and drop inventory items to the tables to serve food and earn points

Keyboard - control a cook in a kitchen.

1,2,3 buttons to change the position of the cook

E button to start the game

For the Arrow Minigame:

W = Up

D = Down

A = Left

D = Right
